dmca.title: [ABUSE] INFRIGEMENT notification for website in your network]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, May 05, 2006 8:19 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] INFRIGEMENT notification for website in your
network]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] INFRIGEMENT notification for website in your
network]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] INFRIGEMENT notification for website in your network
Date: Fri, 5 May 2006 17:33:42 +0600
From: Sergey Gershtein <sg@convert-me.com>
Reply-To: Sergey Gershtein <sg@convert-me.com>
Organization: Convert-Me.Com
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sirs,

According to ARIN WHOIS database IP address 70.84.139.170 belongs to
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

The web site http://convertplus.com residing on 70.84.139.170 infringes
the copyrighted website http://www.convert-me.com.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.convert-me.com/ web site including the root page and over
1,000 other pages in both English and Russian versions of the site
(http://www.convert-me.com/en and http://www.convert-me.com/ru
respectively).

An illegal unauthorized copy of the copyrighted work is placed on
http://convertplus.com

As the owner and copyright holder of http://www.convert-me.com website I
request your assistance in removing the copyrighted material from the
site residing on your IP address or taking the site down completely. I
also seek your assistance in providing me the information (name and
contact information) on the party responsible for the site
http://convertplus.com

I reserve the right to name ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. as a
party in legal action if you do not provide the assistance I request by
Wednesday, May 10th.


Best regards,
Sergey Gershtein

- --
http://www.convert-me.com  mailto:sg@convert-me.com Tel. +7 343 2691634,
Ekaterinburg, Russian Federation






-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEW1CxvK/XpJs6oyURAvfjAJ0dMk/X3uxWeRC6jYTlw+tLeIUfAgCdHWDi
zcbhlSXlCpjm+4ACarZx8kE=
=olHN
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
